wmisc 0.2.23.9000

    Table with descriptive statistics

    nice_descriptives.Rd

    Table with descriptive statistics

    nice_descriptives(
  data,
  round = NULL,
  auto_labels = FALSE,
  title = "Descriptive statistics",
  footnote = NULL
)

    Arguments

    data

    A data frame

    round

    Digits for round function

    auto_labels

    If TRUE, variable names are taken from a label attribute.

    Value

    A data frame with descriptive statistics

    Examples

    nice_descriptives(mtcars)
#>    Variable Valid Missing       Mean          SD    Min     Max   Range  Median
#> 1       mpg    32       0  20.090625   6.0269481 10.400  33.900  23.500  19.200
#> 2       cyl    32       0   6.187500   1.7859216  4.000   8.000   4.000   6.000
#> 3      disp    32       0 230.721875 123.9386938 71.100 472.000 400.900 196.300
#> 4        hp    32       0 146.687500  68.5628685 52.000 335.000 283.000 123.000
#> 5      drat    32       0   3.596563   0.5346787  2.760   4.930   2.170   3.695
#> 6        wt    32       0   3.217250   0.9784574  1.513   5.424   3.911   3.325
#> 7      qsec    32       0  17.848750   1.7869432 14.500  22.900   8.400  17.710
#> 8        vs    32       0   0.437500   0.5040161  0.000   1.000   1.000   0.000
#> 9        am    32       0   0.406250   0.4989909  0.000   1.000   1.000   0.000
#> 10     gear    32       0   3.687500   0.7378041  3.000   5.000   2.000   4.000
#> 11     carb    32       0   2.812500   1.6152000  1.000   8.000   7.000   2.000
